name: REM Paralysis
description:
A 2D Rogue-like game based on dreams and nightmares. In this randomly generated, perma-death game, your goal is to rid your dream world of Nightmares. This Version is a prototype, experimenting with the fundamentals of a Roguelike with only one stage so far!

If we develop the game further, you can expect the following:

  • Fight through 4 stages of "wake", "light sleep", "deep sleep", and "REM sleep", with their own nightmare theme.
  • The stages will become increasingly more vast and complex!
  • More variety and features. More items, More item effects, Shops, etc. More content!
  • A boss battle after every stage just like every Rogue-like needs
